message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I am offering it for $950,000.

Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I see the value in your product,  $950,000 is a bit steep for me at this time. I'm willing to pay $850,000, which I believe is fair considering the value to both of us.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on our previous discussion, I am proposing a new price of $900,000 for the product. I believe this offers a good balance between the value of the product to you and the price you're comfortable with paying.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $900,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $875,000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows us both to come to an agreement.  Let's work together to close this deal.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement. In light of our discussions, I propose a price of $890,000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise that respects the value you place on the product while remaining within your budget.
